review.title: “I've learned so much”
review.pros: Pros – they believe in promote within the company
review.cons: Cons – tense atmosphere and too many security screenings
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – make real commitments with the service culture you are promoting among employees

review.title: “Lukewarm feelings”
review.pros: Pros – Great salary and benefits. Well-meaning company that caters to senior citizen health. The offices are very nice, modern with great equipment. Most of the fellow employees are very nice. The company conducts regular events to celebrate milestones.
review.cons: Cons – Awful parking if you are not part of upper management. Company operations are very scrutinized by the Center of Medicare Service so for design work there are a lot of limits to what you can do. Supervisor can at times be micro-managers which creates an ambiance of mistrust.
review.advice-to-management: No, I would not recommend this company to a friend

review.title: “Very good employer, competitive salaries.”
review.pros: Pros – Very good salaries. Management appreciation for hard workers. Excellent co-workers.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company

review.title: “A continuos learning experience”
review.pros: Pros – Benefits, salaries, skill set of coworkers
review.cons: Cons – Work vs life balance not necessarily the best
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend
